explains: v. 实现；达到，完成；履行，执行；使满足，使有成就感；<旧>结束（一段时间），完成（一件工作）

sentences.en: Without them you will not be able to fulfil the tasks you have before you.
sentences.cn: 没有他们你将不能完成你面前的任务。

sentences.en: The editors can give no guarantee that they will fulfil their obligations.
sentences.cn: 这些编辑不能保证他们将履行职责。

sentences.en: He failed to fulfil his early promise.
sentences.cn: 他没有像小时候表现的那样有出息。
